content: प्रस्थानं {@--1@} Going or setting forth, departure, moving, walking; प्रस्थानविक्लवगतेरवलंबनार्थं <ls>Ś. 5. 3</ls>; <ls>R. 4. 88</ls>; <ls>Me. 41</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 31.</ls> {@--2@} Coming to; <ls>Ku. 6. 61.</ls> {@--3@} Sending away, despatching. {@--4@} Procession, march. {@--5@} A march, the march of an army or assailant. {@--6@} A method, system. {@--7@} Death, dying. {@--8@} An inferior kind of drama; see <ls>S. D. 276</ls>, <ls n="S. D.">544</ls>
